item.title: Social Security’s COLA seen lower in 2026 as market turmoil leaves seniors in limbo
item.description: The cost-of-living adjustment for 2026 would be below the 20-year average and the 2025 figure.

item.title: The stock market hasn’t beaten Trump’s tariffs yet. Here’s what investors should think about now.
item.description: Investors should reset their views about Trump’s priorities and goals during this 90-day trade war cease-fire.

item.title: Is the Nippon Steel bid dead? Here’s the latest as U.S. Steel’s stock plunges again.
item.description: “We don’t want it to go to Japan or any other place, and we’re working with them,” President Donald Trump said of U.S. Steel.

item.title: There’s another big Treasury auction today and it will test investor demand amid tariff volatility
item.description: The next major test of investor appetite for U.S. government debt is set to arrive in just a few hours via a $22 billion auction of 30-year Treasury b...

item.title: Why CarMax’s stock tumbled, even as used-car prices rose for first time 2 years
item.description: CarMax’s stock having worst day since 2022 after profit misses expectations, long-term goals were put on hold given economic uncertainties.
